attributes.action: stop bullying and stop the bully the bull
attributes.additional_details: i would like to start a campaign in all school to stop bullying and have classes where people can talk about how they being bullied and i would like to start a charcter to make rules what you should do if you are bullied and bullying must be stop and to help with the issue have classes where student came talk and even up to college too who be use for there should a place to go to talk this is a very important issue that need to have a solution we are losing so many young people who get bullied and it damage their confident and there should leaflet give out to parents of all ages tell them the signs so they can help their children
